title: (x) Dsquared2 - Acens (customized) {Mark S}
content:
Hello folks,   
This one has me stumped. I am guessing this is a modified version of Eurostile Extended #2? Dsquared2 is an Italian fashion label and maybe someone over there in Europe knows the answer to this font ID?   
   
 ![dquared2](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123848im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27114.gif)
author: skyrocket

comments.content: Looks like [Acens](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123848/http:/www.dafont.com/en/theme.php?cat=401&page=1) with a modified Q.
Just downloaded Acens and printed a full character dump. Looks like you are spot on. Thanks a lot Mark.
